titel57925713.jpg (81.34 KB, 下载次数: 54)

下载附件

2015-2-4 20:16 上传






更新部分


作者的话：I make a scaled model of Midtown Manhattan. I started with building the Chrysler Building as highest building in the area (max build height). From their I build more and more buildings and streets.

Every building has a real lobby and elevators to go to different floors and even to the roof. The buildings have shops on street level to. The only building that is fully furnished is the Chrysler Building.

Why am I building this? Because I really LOVE New York and because I'm inspired by other NY projects on Planet Minecraft :D
Do you want to read a cool review?我做了一个曼哈顿中城的模型。我开始与建筑克莱斯勒大厦为该地区最高的建筑（Max建立高度）。从我建立更多的建筑物和街道。Every building has a real lobby and elevators to go to different floors and even to the roof. The buildings have shops on street level to. The only building that is fully furnished is the Chrysler Building.每一个建筑都有不同的楼层，甚至屋顶上的一个真正的大堂和电梯。建筑的商店街的水平。唯一的建筑，全装修的是克莱斯勒大厦。Why am I building this? Because I really LOVE New York and because I'm inspired by other NY projects on Planet Minecraft :D你知道为什么我的那么漂亮建筑吗？因为我真的爱纽约，因为我的灵感来自纽约的其他项目上Minecraft：D你想给一个酷的评论吗？
最后作者还提到：THIS MAP IS NOT FINISHED YET. UPDATES WILL FOLLOW! 意思是：这张地图还尚未完成，更新将会继续！所以呢，要是作者更新了，我会搬过来的
注：必须是我的世界1.7.2版本以及1.7.2版本以上！
由于是新人，不是知道发帖规则，不知道有回复可置顶这一功能，所以这个存档我发了三个贴，对不起大家{:10_503:}
